plugins.name: git-workflow
plugins.description: Git workflow automation with interactive scripts. Provides branch, sync, commit, push, PR, and merge commands with context isolation.

plugins.name: blog-tools
plugins.description: Blog content management tools. Generate header image prompts from MDX posts and apply optimized images with compression.

plugins.name: sonar
plugins.description: SonarQube issue automation workflow. Collects issues, AI-analyzes/fixes code with parallel subagents, TDD gating, review gates, Jira integration, and web dashboard sync.
